hexagrams.name: Force
hexagrams.desc: Strength, creative energy, action; the power of heaven to create and destroy; dynamic, untiring, tenacious, enduring.

hexagrams.name: Field
hexagrams.desc:
Yield, nourish, provide; the power to give form to all things; receptive, gentle, giving, supple;
welcome, consent.

hexagrams.name: Sprouting
hexagrams.desc: Beginning of growth and its problems; gather your strength; establish, found, assemble.

hexagrams.name: Enveloping
hexagrams.desc:
Immature, young, unaware; concealed, hidden;
nurture hidden growth, apprenticeship.

hexagrams.name: Attending
hexagrams.desc: Wait for, wait on; attend to what is needed; watch for the right moment; participant in a sacrifice.

hexagrams.name: Arguing
hexagrams.desc: Dispute, controversy, argument; express your position; resolve or retreat from conflict.

hexagrams.name: Legions
hexagrams.desc: Discipline, organize into functional units, mobilize, lead; master of arms.

hexagrams.name: Grouping
hexagrams.desc: Alliance, mutual support, spiritual kin; how you group things and people; changing groups.

hexagrams.name: Small Accumulating
hexagrams.desc: Accumulate small things to do something great; adapt to each thing that crosses your path; nurture, tame, support, collect.

hexagrams.name: Treading
hexagrams.desc: Find and make your way, step by step; conduct, manners, salary, support.

hexagrams.name: Pervading
hexagrams.desc: Prospering, expanding, great abundance and harmony; peace, communication; spring, flowering.

hexagrams.name: Obstruction
hexagrams.desc: Obstacle, blocked communication; decline, cut off, closed; late autumn.

hexagrams.name: Concording People
hexagrams.desc: Harmony, bring people together, share your idea or goal, welcome others, co-operate.

hexagrams.name: Great Possessions
hexagrams.desc: A powerful idea; great power to realize things; organize your efforts, concentrate; great results and achievements.

hexagrams.name: Humbling
hexagrams.desc: Cut through pride and complications, keep close to fundamental things; be simple; think and speak of yourself humbly.

hexagrams.name: Providing For
hexagrams.desc: Gather what you need to meet the future; able to respond immediately; enjoy, pleasure, enthusiasm, be carried away.

hexagrams.name: Following
hexagrams.desc: Be drawn into motion; influenced by, accept guidance; move with the flow, natural and correct.

hexagrams.name: Corruption
hexagrams.desc: Disorder, perversion or decay with roots in the past, black magic; renew, renovate, find a new beginning.

hexagrams.name: Nearing
hexagrams.desc: Approach, the arrival of the new, growing; an honoured and powerful force comes nearer.

hexagrams.name: Viewing
hexagrams.desc: Look at things from a distance, contemplate, let everything come into view, divine the meaning.

hexagrams.name: Gnawing And Biting Through
hexagrams.desc: Confront the problem, bite through the obstacle, be tenacious, reveal the essential.

hexagrams.name: Adorning
hexagrams.desc: Make outward appearance reflect inner worth; embellish, beautify, display courage and beauty to build inner value.

hexagrams.name: Stripping
hexagrams.desc: Strip away old ideas and habits, eliminate what is unusable, outmoded or worn out.

hexagrams.name: Returning
hexagrams.desc: Energy and spirit return after a difficult time; renewal, re-birth, re-establish; new hope.

hexagrams.name: Without Embroiling
hexagrams.desc: Disentangle yourself; spontaneous, unplanned, direct; clean, pure, free from confusion or ulterior motives.

hexagrams.name: Great Accumulating
hexagrams.desc: Concentrate, focus on a great idea; accumulate energy, bring everything together; a time for great effort and achievement.

hexagrams.name: Jaws
hexagrams.desc: Nourishing and being nourished, food and words; the mouth, your daily bread; take things in, swallow.

hexagrams.name: Great Exceeding
hexagrams.desc: A crisis; gather all your force, don't be afraid to act alone; hold on to your ideals.

hexagrams.name: Repeating The Gorge
hexagrams.desc: Unavoidable danger; take the plunge, face your fear; practise, confront something repeatedly.

hexagrams.name: Radiance
hexagrams.desc: Light, warmth and spreading awareness; join with, adhere to; see clearly.

hexagrams.name: Conjoining
hexagrams.desc: Influence or stimulus to action, excite, mobilize; connection, bring together what belongs together.

hexagrams.name: Persevering
hexagrams.desc: Continue on, endure and renew the way, constant, consistent, continue in what is right.

hexagrams.name: Retiring
hexagrams.desc: Withdraw, conceal yourself, retreat; pull back in order to advance later.

hexagrams.name: Great Invigorating
hexagrams.desc: Great strength, the strength of the Great, have a firm purpose, focus your strength and go forward.

hexagrams.name: Prospering
hexagrams.desc: Step into the light, advance surely, receive gifts, be promoted, spread prosperity, dawn of a new day.

hexagrams.name: Hiding Brightness
hexagrams.desc: Hide your light, protect yourself, accept the difficult task.

hexagrams.name: Dwelling People
hexagrams.desc: Hold together, an enduring group; adapt, nourish, support; family, clan.

hexagrams.name: Diverging
hexagrams.desc: Opposition, discord; change conflict into creative tension through awareness.

hexagrams.name: Difficulties
hexagrams.desc: Confront obstacles; feel hampered or afflicted.

hexagrams.name: Loosening
hexagrams.desc: Solve problems, untie knots, release blocked energy; liberation, end of suffering.

hexagrams.name: Diminishing
hexagrams.desc: Loss, decrease, sacrifice; concentrate, diminish involvements; aim at a higher goal.

hexagrams.name: Augmenting
hexagrams.desc: Increase, expand, develop, pour in more, a fertile and expansive time.

hexagrams.name: Deciding
hexagrams.desc: A critical moment, a breakthrough; decide and act clearly, clean it out and bring it to light.

hexagrams.name: Coupling
hexagrams.desc: Opening, welcoming, an intense personal encounter; meet and act through the yin, sexual intercourse.

hexagrams.name: Clustering
hexagrams.desc: Gather, assemble, collect, bunch together, crowds; a great effort brings great rewards.

hexagrams.name: Ascending
hexagrams.desc: Rise to a higher level, lift yourself, advance; climb up step by step.

hexagrams.name: Confining
hexagrams.desc: Oppression, restriction, being cut off; the moment of truth; turn inward, find a way to open communication.

hexagrams.name: The Well
hexagrams.desc: Communicate, interact, in good order; the underlying structure, network; source of life-water necessary to all.

hexagrams.name: Skinning
hexagrams.desc: Renew; moult, change radically, strip away the old, revolution, revolt.

hexagrams.name: The Vessel
hexagrams.desc: Transformation, reach to the spiritual level; found, consecrate, imagine, contain.

hexagrams.name: Shake
hexagrams.desc: A disturbing and fertilizing shock; wake up, stir up, begin the new; return of life and love in spring.

hexagrams.name: Bound
hexagrams.desc: Calm, still, stabilize; limit or boundary, end of a cycle; become an individual.

hexagrams.name: Gradual Advancing
hexagrams.desc: Step by step, smooth, adaptable, penetrate like water; the oldest daughter's marriage.

hexagrams.name: Converting The Maiden
hexagrams.desc: Choice or transformation over which you have no control; realize your hidden potential; passion, desire, irregular progress; the younger daughter's marriage.

hexagrams.name: Abounding
hexagrams.desc: Culmination, plenty, copious, profusion; generosity, opulence, full to overflowing.

hexagrams.name: Sojourning
hexagrams.desc: Wandering, living in exile, searching for your individual truth; outside the social net, on a quest.

hexagrams.name: Gently Penetrating
hexagrams.desc: Supple, flexible, subtle penetration; accept, let yourself be shaped by the situation; support or nourish from below.

hexagrams.name: Open
hexagrams.desc: Communication, self-expression; pleasure, joy, interaction; persuade, exchange, the marketplace.

hexagrams.name: Dispersing
hexagrams.desc: Dissolve, clear away, scatter, clear up; make fluid, eliminate obstacles and misundestandings.

hexagrams.name: Articulating
hexagrams.desc: Give measure, limit and form; articulate thought and speech; rhythm, interval, chapter, units.

hexagrams.name: Connecting To Centre
hexagrams.desc: Connection to the spirit; just, sincere, truthful; the power of a heart free of prejudice; connect the inner and outer parts of your life.

hexagrams.name: Small Exceeding
hexagrams.desc: A time of transition, adapt to each different thing; be very careful, very small; excess yin.

hexagrams.name: Already Fording
hexagrams.desc: Already underway, the action has begun; proceed actively, everything is in place and in order.

hexagrams.name: Not Yet Fording
hexagrams.desc: On the edge of an important change; gather your energy, everything is possible; wait for the right moment.
